entry.name: pulsate
entry.title: Pulsate Effect
entry.desc: The pulsate effect hides or shows an element by pulsing it in or out.

argument.name: times
argument.desc: The number of times the element should pulse. An extra half pulse is added for hide/show.

example.desc: Toggle a div using the pulsate effect.
example.html: Click anywhere to toggle the box.
